```{=html}
<script>
(function(){
  const STORAGE_KEY = "showMaleFigures";
  const root = document.documentElement;
  const toggle = document.getElementById("maleToggle");

  function apply(showMale){
    root.classList.toggle("male-hidden", !showMale);
    window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent("male-visibility-change", { detail: { showMale } }));
  }

  const saved = localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY);
  const showMale = saved === null ? false : saved === "true";
  toggle.checked = showMale;
  apply(showMale);

  toggle.addEventListener("change", () => {
    const v = toggle.checked;
    localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, String(v));
    apply(v);
  });
})();
</script>
```
